title: ISRO announces Chandrayaan-3 launch window
content: ISRO has announced the upcoming Chandrayaan-3 mission. The launch window is set for late July. Officials said the objective is to demonstrate a soft landing on the lunar surface.

title: Chandrayaan-3 successfully launched
content: The Chandrayaan-3 spacecraft lifted off successfully. ISRO confirmed the launch and initial stages of trajectory insertion went as planned.

title: Chandrayaan-3 achieves soft landing
content: The lander achieved a soft landing near the lunar south pole. Officials celebrated the milestone.
